contentrichtext.text: {{ref improve|date=October 2011}} This is a '''list of philatelists''', persons notable for their contributions to [[philately]]. <!--PLEASE RESPECT ALPHABETICAL ORDER--> * [[Oscar Berger-Levrault]] * [[Kasimir Bileski]] * [[Gustave Caillebotte]] * [[Samuel Chapman]], of Mexico * [[Sir Daniel Cooper, 1st Baronet|Daniel Cooper]], founder and first president of Philatelic Society of London * [[Jal Cooper]] * [[Gerald Davis, philatelist|Gerald Davis]] * [[C.D. Desai]] * [[Sir Ernest de Silva]], Sri Lanka's greatest philatelist * [[Emilio Diena]], ancient Italian state specialist<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.enzodiena.com/storia_en.html |title=Enzo Diena: Short history of Dienas' Philatelic Bureau |publisher=Enzo Diena.com |accessdate=2008-12-15}}</ref><ref name="apshof00-04">{{cite web|url=http://www.stamps.org/almanac/alm_halloffame_2000-04.htm |title=Hall of Fame - 2000-2004 |publisher=[[American Philatelic Society]] |date=1999 |accessdate=2008-12-15}} </ref> * [[Robert Brisco Earée]], album weeds * [[Edward B. Evans]], "Major Evans" * [[David Feldman (philatelist)|David Feldman]] * [[Adelaide Lucy Fenton]], early female philatelist * [[Ferdinand of Bulgaria]] * [[Philipp von Ferrary]] * [[George V of the United Kingdom]], royal collector * [[Edward Stanley Gibbons]], British dealer * [[John Edward Gray]] * [[Edward Howland Robinson Green|Colonel Green]] * [[George Higlett]] * [[Arthur Hind (1856 - 1933)|Arthur Hind]] * [[Mauritius "Post Office"#Philatelic discovery|Hiroyuki Kanai]], of Mauritius * [[Anatoly Karpov]]<ref>{{cite web |url= http://www.davidfeldman.com/buying/auctions/upcoming-auctions/autumn-sales-series-geneva-december-6-10-2011/belgium-collection/ |title=Belgium collection formed by Anatoly Karpov |publisher=David Feldman |year=2011 |accessdate=2011-10-12}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.watch-clone.com/articles/c4.html|title=Anatoly Karpov: The Owner of the Unique Stamp Collection|publisher=Watch-Clone.com|accessdate=28 March 2011}}</ref> * [[Adolph Koeppel]] * [[Pierre Langlois (philatelist)|Pierre Langlois]] * [[H. Dormer Legge]] * [[Alfred Lichtenstein (philatelist)|Alfred Lichtenstein]]<ref name="apshof46-49">{{cite web|url=http://www.stamps.org/almanac/alm_halloffame_1946-49.htm |title=Hall of Fame - 1946-1949 |publisher=[[American Philatelic Society]] |date=1999 |accessdate=2008-12-15}} </ref> * [[James Ludovic Lindsay, 26th Earl of Crawford, 9th Earl of Balcarres|James Lindsay, 26th Earl of Crawford]], formed massive philatelic library<ref name="apshof41">{{cite web|url=http://www.stamps.org/almanac/alm_halloffame_1941.htm |title=Hall of Fame - 1941 |publisher=[[American Philatelic Society]] |date=1999 |accessdate=2008-12-15}} </ref> * [[George Ward Linn]], founder of Linn's Weekly Stamp News * [[Robson Lowe]], the "father of postal history"<ref name="apshof95-99">{{cite web|url=http://www.stamps.org/almanac/alm_HallofFame_1995-99.htm |title=Hall of Fame - 1995-1999 |publisher=[[American Philatelic Society]] |date=1999 |accessdate=2008-12-15}}</ref> * [[John Luff]]<ref name="apshof41"/> * [[James A. Mackay]] * [[Fred Melville]] * [[Jean-Baptiste Moens]], the "father of philately" * [[Walter Morley]] * [[Edwin Müller]]<ref name="apshof70-74">{{cite web|url=http://www.stamps.org/Almanac/alm_HallofFame_1970-74.htm |title=Hall of Fame - 1970-1974 |publisher=[[American Philatelic Society]] |date=1999 |accessdate=2008-12-27}}</ref> * [[Douglas Myall]] * [[Alfred Potiquet]], first stamp catalogue * [[Ayn Rand]]<ref name="apshof1a-ad">{{cite web|url=http://www.ellensplace.net/ar_stamp.html |title=Why I Like Stamp Collecting - 1971 |publisher=Minkus Stamp Journal |accessdate=2009-01-13}}</ref> * [[L. T. Rose-Hutchinson]] * [[Stuart Rossiter]] * [[Gary Ryan (philatelist)|Gary Ryan]] * [[Franklin Delano Roosevelt|Franklin D. Roosevelt]], presidential collector<ref name="apshof42-45">{{cite web|url=http://www.stamps.org/almanac/alm_halloffame_1942-45.htm |title=Hall of Fame - 1942-1945 |publisher=[[American Philatelic Society]] |date=1999 |accessdate=2008-12-15}}</ref> * [[Lawrence L. Shenfield|Lawrence L Shenfield]], Confederate postal history * [[E. A. Smythies|Evelyn Arthur Smythies]] * [[Richard Stevens]], Mexico revenue catalog * [[William Carlos Stone]], revenues and philatelic literature<ref name="apshof46-49"/> * [[Thomas Tapling]]<ref name="apshof41"/> * [[Charlotte Tebay]], early female philatelist * [[Leon Norman Williams]]<ref name="apshof00-04"/> * [[Hakim Syed Zillur Rahman]], collector of medical stamps * [[Robert Zoellner]], only complete US collection ==See also== * [[Topical stamp collecting]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Lists of people by occupation|Philatelists]] [[Category:Philatelists| ]] <!-- star for lists μ for stubs-->
